'''William "Willie" Crowther''' ([[1936]]) was the author of the strong [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] influeced Text-Adventure [[wikipedia:Colossal Cave Adventure|Colossal Cave Adventure]], on which [[Colossal Adventure]] was based.<ref>[http://www.faqs.org/faqs/tolkien/games/ FAQS, Tolkien Games] (retrieved 17 August 2010)</ref>
